en: The Lord God is my Strength
He has made my feet like hinds'feet
Habakkuk 3:19
Birch Trees in Winter
on first day of snowfall
Hold on, roots!

ko: 주의 여종이오니 말씀대로 내게 이루어 지이다
en: Sound
I am your handmaiden; let it be to me as you have said
Luke 1:38

ko: 산 위에 잇는 동네가 숨기지지 못할 것이요
en: You are the Light of the World
A city on a hill cannot be hidden
Matthew 5:14
hills taken by foriegn powers
yet spring comes to Russia
breaking through the frozen earth
Fall on the Hudson River
The Lord is at my right hand
The shadows of the Almighty upon my life

ko: 함께 붙들어 주고 있는 사랑의 공동체
en: Shoulder to Shoulder
Birch Trees in Summer
Holding each other up with love
The Shack
A home where the Lord waits for me
After watching The Shack

ko: 많은 친구들을 데리고 와서 함께 불붙었던 밤
en: A bush alit with Flame
A youth summer retreat
Where me and many friends caught on fire for the lord

ko: 온 땅의 겨울을 덮은 봄의 생기
en: Spring in the plains of Fresno
on my 35th wedding anniversary
The vibrancy of spring that has swallowed up winter

ko: 눈이 닿는 끝까지 내린 하얀 꽃세상
en: First time seeling almond flowers
is every flower an almond?
a floral white wonderland as far as the eye can see

ko: 누구보다 먼저 봄을 전하고 싶은 마음
en: The cherry blossoms who could not wait
rushing to be the first to announce the arrival of spring
its bloom heralds the season of Christ
a feburary of orange trees in Fresno
Somehow oranges are in season in winter
Delicous oranges in the cold early spring

ko: 소중한 친구와 다녀왔던 콜로라도 겨울 리트릿
팬데믹 속에서 다녀온 잊을수 없는 여행
en: a winter cabin
precious time with precious friends in Colorado
An unforgetting winter retreat during the pandemic

ko: 펜 하나로 그린 겨울 사슴의 집
주님과 있고 싶은 아가서 같은 집
en: a winter home for the hinds with one pen
teaching me how fun it is to do pen drawing
A house to want to be with the Lord, like the song of songs.

ko: 하늘 향해 높히 두팔 들고 기도하는 나무
낙심않고 곧게 서서 함께 기도하는 사람들
en: The prayer tress of Orlando
Both hands raised in prayer towards the heavens
Those who do not lose heart but persist in prayer
Wintering
When snowmen melt and footsteps erase
time to dream of spring

ko: 거친 땅 구석에 피어난 부활 꽃
en: Fall Lily
before surgery in 2022 at Incheon Airport
a lent lily blooming in a rough corner of the world
Gethsemane
All-wheel drive to escape the swamp
Prayer begets miracles

ko: 절벽 바위에 카펫 처럼 함께 핀 꽃들
en: State Lookout park on the banks of the Hudson
Above, a eagle gliding
Below, flowers cover the rock face like a carpet
the Chives are flowering
the starlight is raining down tonight
while the white flowers drink up the moonlight

ko: 대지의 카펫에 예쁜 자수를 놓으신 하나님
우린 하나님 안에서 그의 꽃길을 걷고 있어요
en: Embriodered flowers
Beutiful handiwork on the carpet of the earth by God
We in him walk in his Embriodered paths

ko: 어디서나 볼 수 있는 흔한 꽃
en: Flower delivery!
Flowers you can find anywhere
Beutiful when blooming togehter
024 first description
024 second line
024 third line

ko: 나룻배 같은 전도자의 삶을 생각하는 가을날
en: A ferry boat of the fall
Moves people without complaint or fanfare
Maybe that is the real life of an evangalist
Seven Stars
On the banks of the Hudson
Thinking of the seven lamps, the churches of God
The Cornflower, known to be medicinal
Beauty and healing together
I wish to be such a flower

ko: 하나님의 사랑 가운데 있는 듯 다정한 꽃
en: A nameless flower on an unknown hill
a Mom and Daughter
An affection which echo the love of God
In conversation with my son...
I wonder what you carry in your heart?
May it fill and overflow with the Grace of God

ko: 화려한 성탄 장식 속에서 멋지게 서있는 하얀 나무
en: Scenes of Christmas at New Jersey
A white tree stands tall admist colerful decorations
A season made more beautiful by togetherness

ko: 새해 첫날 해돋이 보러가서 보이지 않는 태양에 실망했을 때
마음 속에 들린 말 쉿! 그리고 떠오른 해
en: Shhhh!
When I was disappointed I could not see the sun on the first sunrise of the year
To hear in my heart Shhh! Look! The Sun has already risen.

ko: 숲 속 호수에 비친 나무 그림자
en: At Flat Rock Park in New Jersey
Reflections of the trees on the forest lake
Could I reflect you like this God?

ko: 나의 삶의 가지가지 사이 주님의 빛이 가득하길
en: The Brightness of the fall light
Overflows the forest
So may Christ's light do so with me
A house of fellowship in Orlando
to dwell in unity
filling with each other's life stories

ko: 각자 서 있어도 모든 뿌리가 함께 서로를 세워 주는 나무들
en: Birch Tree
First time painting a wood on wooden canvas
Though apart, the roots support each others unseen

ko: 주님 만나러 가는 가슴 뛰는 길
en: On the way to Retreat
On the way to meet the Lord
With great longing for intimacy with him

ko: 2월의 추위에 일찍 핀 꽃이 얼음 속에서 보석이 되었어요
en: Ice Flower
Near General Sherman at Yosemite
An early bloom caught by frost- in ice, a Jewel!
First Thanksgiving during Covid
As I miss those who I cannot meet
I dream of a bridge that would connect us all

ko: 사랑하는 친구들과 가고 싶은 기도의 집
언제나 기다려 주실 주님의 품으로 가고 싶은 마음
en: A house in the woods
A house of prayer
To invite myself towards the waiting arms of Jesus

ko: 별이 쏟아지던 어느 밤 문득 뒷마당에 가득한 부추꽃처럼
온 밤을 하얗게 꽃처럼 기도하고픈 마음으로
en: A house of Prayer
As starlight showers down on my backyard
May my prayer so light up all of the night

ko: 그 아래 주님의 가을이 가득 임했어요
en: Snow and Fall
Unmelting snow, ever snowcapped
Beneath, the progression of the Lord’s Fall
Harmony
My wooden canvas fills with paint
I carve the paint to see the trees

ko: 나의 살던 고향은 꽃 피는 산골
en: My Hometown is a mountainous village
A peach tree, apricots, flowers, a baby, azaleas
Oh how I long for my childhood hometown
Cosmos
The Flower of longing
Its blooms line the path to my hometown
Winter
Painted on Tile
Thinking of root-strength, powerful together
Fall
A field full of Wind
The grass hugs the wind as it sings in its arms

ko: 활짝 핀 꽃에 담긴 하나님 향기
en: Summer
A refreshing breeze fills the air
The wide-open blooms carry the fragrance of God

ko: 어둠과 겨울을 깨고 올라오는 생명의 기운
누구도 막을 수 없는 하나님의 계절
en: Spring
The Spirit of life that overcomes the dark and the cold
None can delay the season of Christ

ko: 빈 그릇을 빌되 조금 빌지 말고 (왕하4:1-7)
en: Empty Vessels
Borrow from every neighbor
Don’t borrow just a few!

ko: 빈 그릇 마다 채워지는 하나님의 기름
평생 빈 그릇되어 은혜를 사모하게 하소서
en: Borrowed Vessels
Every vessel filled to overflowing with God’s oil
May I ever be an empty vessel, ever being filled!

ko: 22년 수술 후에 감사한 마음을 담은 그림
작은 빗자루로 물감을 찍어서 그린 그림
en: Fall Birch Trees
Holds my grateful heart towards my surgery 22 years ago
Like this paint holding onto my brush

042.png.ko: 푸른 언덕 위의 바람|흔들리는 풀잎들|그 사이로 지나가는 시간
042.png.en: Wind on the blue hill|Swaying blades of grass|Time passing through them

053.png.ko: 빛나는 저녁노을|물결 위의 반짝임|하루의 마지막 인사
053.png.en: Glowing evening sunset|Sparkle on the waves|Final greeting of the day

054.png.ko: 고요한 숲속의 숨결|나무 사이의 속삭임|자연의 깊은 이야기
054.png.en: Breath of a quiet forest|Whispers between trees|Nature’s deep story

055.png.ko: 끝없는 길 위의 발자국|지나온 시간의 흔적|앞으로 나아가는 마음
055.png.en: Footsteps on an endless path|Traces of time passed|Heart moving forward
